item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is our favorite post-softball hang-out:

HUMPHREY'S EAST

www.175humphreyseast.com

I worked with the manager (Terrence) and got us some great specials:

$1 Drafts FOR THE 1ST HOUR!!!

Then as follows:

$2 Domestic Bottles

$3 Stoli Doli

$3.00 Drafts

$3.00 Martinis

1/2 off on all Margaritas

FREE Appetizers Include:

Fried Calamari
Fried Mozzarella
Buffalo Tenders
Chicken Tenders
Humphreys Famous Hot Wings
Potato Skins
Buffalo Shrimp
Quesadillas


Contact will be Robyn-Allise 203-823-5302 and/or KBS
item.name: Mon 6/18 - Happy Hour at Humphrey's East
